title: How to get rid of your limiting disbelief? Are there any good techniques - Quora

response.answer_text: Step 1: So identify it as a limit on your life/performance/outlook/disposition Step 2: Engage it with study and thought. Examine alternatives to believing or disbelieving it. How would your life change if you believed differently? What cost would you have to pay? Is it worth it? Step 3: Build a plan to change your belief/non-belief and life. Try to start with small, easily achievable steps, to record some early successes Step 4: If you really want this change, stick to the plan. See if you can find a community of like-minded folks, and hang with them

This answer would answer your question. I didn't use any techniques. The disbelief here is 'not trusting oneself'. Instead I decided, I am going to keep my mind and thoughts open and accepting. Basically being flexible in my mind and thought process. Jayasree Padmanabhan's answer to Do you agree that intelligent thinking is largely a matter of constructing mental models? All the very best! Regards, Swaroopa.
